name: ktoshi
description: Ktoshi is a community-driven meme token inspired by The pseudonymous creator of Bitcoin, Satoshi Nakamoto & the Kadena blockchain. Launched in Aug 2024, the project aims to embrace the lighthearted Camaraderie and humorous side of cryptocurrency by creating a token centered around internet culture and community engagement. Rather than focusing on complex use cases or utility, ktoshi is built around the idea of shared fun and cultural relevance.
